item.title: Getting Started
item.description:
This guide will help you get up and running with Zest.

Installation

Zest is available on the following platforms:

  • Web: Access the Zest web app directly from your browser.
  • iOS: Download the Zest app from the App Store.
  • Android: Download the Zest app from the Google Play Store.

Creating an Account

To get the most out of Zest, you’ll need to create an account. This will allow you to save your favorite recipes, create meal plans, and more.

item.title: Meal Planner
item.description:
The meal planner is a powerful tool that helps you organize your meals for the week.

Adding Recipes to Your Meal Plan

To add a recipe to your meal plan, follow these steps:

  1. Find the recipe you want to add.
  2. On the recipe detail screen, tap the “Add to Meal Plan” button.
  3. Select the day and meal (breakfast, lunch, or dinner) for which you want to schedule the recipe.

Viewing Your Meal Plan

You can view your meal plan by tapping on the “Meal Plan” tab. This will show you a calendar view of your scheduled meals for the week. You can tap on any meal to see the recipe details.

item.title: Recipes
item.description:
The heart of Zest is its recipe collection. Here’s how to manage and use recipes in the app.

Finding Recipes

You can find recipes in a few different ways:

  • Browse: The main screen of the app shows a list of all available recipes. You can scroll through this list to discover new ideas.
  • Search: Use the search bar at the top of the screen to find recipes by name or ingredient.
  • Filter: You can filter the recipe list by cuisine and difficulty to narrow down your options.

item.title: Shopping List
item.description:
The shopping list feature helps you keep track of the ingredients you need to buy for your planned meals.

Generating a Shopping List

You can generate a shopping list from your meal plan or from a single recipe.

  • From your meal plan: Go to the “Meal Plan” tab and tap the “Generate Shopping List” button. This will create a shopping list with all the ingredients you need for the week’s meals.
  • From a recipe: On the recipe detail screen, tap the “Add to Shopping List” button. This will add the ingredients for that recipe to your shopping list.
